title: Hogwarts Legacy Lead Designer Quits - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.05.21
description:
Blessing is joined by Gamespot's Michael Higham to talk about Hogwarts Legacy losing its lead designer, Artifact support coming to an end, and more.

Follow Michael: https://twitter.com/michaelphigham

00:00:00 - Start
00:08:07 - Housekeeping
Right after this live episode of KFGD, we’re streaming Super Mario 3D World in collaboration with Rooster Teeth to raise money for a good cause. That’ll be me, Tim, Andy, Snowbike Mike, and Alfredo Diaz right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
We revealed the new MCU In Review intro yesterday: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1367892752420147200 
In case you missed it: There’s a brand new episode of The Blessing Show up right now where I break down “What makes a good puzzle game”. I interviewed the dev behind one of my favorite puzzle games “Manifold Garden” and it has some of Roger’s best editing work to date. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames right now.
The Roper Report   -
00:12:01 - A Hogwarts Legacy lead designer quits Avalanche following public backlash
00:24:12 - Valve ends development on Artifact
00:32:20 - 2 Million People have downloaded the Outriders Demo
00:37:59 - Ghost of Tsushima devs are becoming permanent ambassadors for the actual island of Tsushima
00:45:33 -  Ad
00:50:13 - Animal Crossing New Horizon has detailed its March Update
00:54:44 - Ant-Man Might Be The Next Fortnite Character
00:55:58 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
00:58:00 - Squad Up: Fernando Rodrigues - Twitch - roll_twice
00:58:53 - You‘re Wrong
01:02:49 - Post Show
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Keza MacDonald
TUESDAY: Greg and Gary Whitta
WEDNESDAY: Blessing and Janet Garcia (Mario Day)
THURSDAY: Tim and Tamoor Hussain
FRIDAY: Greg and Alex O’Neill

Blessing is joined by Gamespot's Michael Higham to talk about Hogwarts Legacy losing its lead designer, Artifact support coming to an end, and more.

Follow Michael: https://twitter.com/michaelphigham

00:00:00 - Start
00:08:07 - Housekeeping
Right after this live episode of KFGD, we’re streaming Super Mario 3D World in collaboration with Rooster Teeth to raise money for a good cause. That’ll be me, Tim, Andy, Snowbike Mike, and Alfredo Diaz right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames.
We revealed the new MCU In Review intro yesterday: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1367892752420147200 
In case you missed it: There’s a brand new episode of The Blessing Show up right now where I break down “What makes a good puzzle game”. I interviewed the dev behind one of my favorite puzzle games “Manifold Garden” and it has some of Roger’s best editing work to date. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames right now.
